Code:
EXEC SQL  SELECT value(count(*)0)
FROM seguros.v0sinistro_auto1
 
where t1.num_apolice         =  :NUM_APOLICE
  and t1.num_item      between  :SI2MW001.W-ITEM-INICIAL
                           and  :SI2MW001.W-ITEM-FINAL
  and t1.ramo                =  31
  and t2.num_apol_sinistro   =  t1.num_apol_sinistro
  and t2.num_apolice         =  t1.num_apolice
  and t2.codcau             in  (01,02,19,21)
  and t2.situacao           <>  '2'
  and t3.num_apol_sinistro   =  t1.num_apol_sinistro
  and t3.operacao           in  (1081,1082,1083,1084,1089)
  and t3.situacao           <>  '2'
/
 END SQL
